whatIs.question: What is GrapholexInsight?
whatIs.answer: GrapholexInsight is a comprehensive forensic graphology analysis system offering signature analysis with 21 real parameters, multilingual OCR, AI semantic search, peer review according to ENFSI standards, and an educational quiz system. It's designed for legal and investigative professionals.

howToStart.question: How can I start using the application?
howToStart.answer:
1. Register by creating an account
2. Upload your documents from the Documents section
3. Use the features: signature analysis, OCR, AI search
4. Generate professional reports of results
The system will guide you through each feature with contextual suggestions.

supportedFormats.question: What document formats are supported?
supportedFormats.answer:
GrapholexInsight supports:
Documents: PDF, DOCX, TXT, HTML
Images: PNG, JPEG, JPG (for signatures and OCR)
Maximum size: 25MB per file
All formats are automatically processed and indexed for semantic search.

languageChange.question: How can I change the interface language?
languageChange.answer: The interface is available in Italian and English. You can change language via the selector in the application's top bar. The change is applied immediately to all features, including reports, quizzes and user interface.

upload.question: How do I upload a document?
upload.answer:
You can upload documents in two ways:
1. Drag & Drop: Drag files directly into the upload area
2. Click to select: Click 'Select files' and choose from your computer
Documents are automatically processed and indexed for AI search.

fileSize.question: What is the maximum file size?
fileSize.answer: The maximum size per file is 25MB. This limit ensures optimal performance during processing. For very large documents, we recommend using the complete OCR mode which includes progress indicators and interruption controls.

delete.question: How can I delete an uploaded document?
delete.answer:
In the Documents section:
1. Find the document in the list
2. Click the trash icon
3. Confirm deletion
Warning: Deletion permanently removes the document and all associated data from AI searches.

indexing.question: Why isn't my document being indexed?
indexing.answer:
Possible causes:
• Unsupported format - Check it's PDF, DOCX, TXT or HTML
• Corrupted or password-protected file
• Size exceeds 25MB
• Non-textual content - For images use OCR function
Check status in the 'Indexed' column in the document list.

analysis.question: How does signature analysis work?
analysis.answer:
The system uses advanced computer vision to:
1. Automatic cropping of signature from image
2. Millimetric calibration for real parameters
3. Analysis of 21 forensic graphological parameters
4. Comparison with reference database
5. PDF report generation with objective AI evaluation

parameters.question: What are the 21 analyzed parameters?
parameters.answer:
Parameters include:
Dynamic: Pressure, speed, stroke fluidity
Morphological: Inclination, dimensions, proportions
Spatial: Spacing, alignment, distribution
Qualitative: Tremors, interruptions, corrections
Structural: Connections, angles, curvatures
All measured in real millimeters thanks to automatic calibration.

authenticity.question: How do I interpret authenticity results?
authenticity.answer:
Results are classified according to forensic standards:
≥85%: Authentic - High probability of authenticity
65-84%: Probably authentic - Requires additional verification
<65%: Suspicious - Needs thorough analysis
The PDF report includes detailed AI analysis for each parameter.

compare.question: Can I compare multiple signatures simultaneously?
compare.answer:
Yes, the system supports multiple comparisons:
1. Upload the reference signature (known authentic)
2. Upload signatures to verify
3. System generates automatic comparative tables
4. Calculates compatibility percentages for each comparison
The report will include graphs and statistical analysis of parameters.

languages.question: What languages does OCR support?
languages.answer:
OCR supports over 100 languages, including:
Major: Italian, English, French, German, Spanish
European: Russian, Polish, Dutch, Portuguese
Asian: Chinese, Japanese, Arabic
The system automatically detects document language and optimizes processing.

improve.question: How to improve recognition quality?
improve.answer:
Tips for optimal results:
• High resolution images (minimum 300 DPI)
• Well contrasted text on uniform background
• Avoid excessive inclinations
• Use 'Enhance' mode for low quality images
• 'Sharpen' mode for blurred text
• 'Denoise' mode for noisy images

modes.question: What are the processing modes (Auto, Enhance, etc.)?
modes.answer:
Auto: Automatically detects and applies best processing
Enhance: Improves contrast and brightness for dark images
Sharpen: Increases sharpness for blurred text
Denoise: Removes noise and digital artifacts
Complete: Advanced mode for large documents (120+ pages) with progress tracking

largeDocuments.question: Can I process multi-page documents?
largeDocuments.answer:
Yes, complete mode is optimized for large documents:
• Progress indicators with precise percentages
• Interruption controls for long operations
• Block processing for memory efficiency
• Auto-indexing in database for AI searches
Supports documents up to 500+ pages.

semantic.question: How does document search work?
semantic.answer:
Search uses advanced semantic AI:
1. Documents are processed and vectorized
2. Queries are analyzed for meaning, not just words
3. AI finds conceptually related content
4. Generates contextual responses based on your documents
Supports natural language searches in Italian and English.

whatSemantic.question: What does 'semantic search' mean?
whatSemantic.answer:
Semantic search understands meaning beyond words:
Traditional: Searches exact words 'sales contract'
Semantic: Also finds 'transfer agreement', 'purchase deed'
AI understands synonyms, context and conceptual relationships, returning more relevant and complete results.

betterAnswers.question: How can I get better answers from AI?
betterAnswers.answer:
Tips for effective queries:
• Be specific: 'Find warranty clauses in contract' vs 'search warranty'
• Use context: 'In the 2023 document, what are payment terms?'
• Ask for elaboration: 'Summarize main contract points'
• Combine questions: 'Compare clauses between document A and B'

privacy.question: Are my documents private?
privacy.answer:
Absolute privacy guaranteed:
• Documents are stored in your personal database
• Never shared with other users or external services
• End-to-end encryption for transmissions
• Automatic anonymization available for sensitive data
• Secure deletion when requested

whatIs.question: What is the Peer Review system?
whatIs.answer:
Peer Review is a collaborative validation system for graphological expertise:
• Reviews by qualified sector experts
• ENFSI standards compliance (European Network of Forensic Science Institutes)
• Anonymous process for impartiality
• Professional certification of results

request.question: How can I request a review?
request.answer:
To request a peer review:
1. Go to Peer Review section
2. Select the analysis or expertise to be reviewed
3. Choose review type (standard or detailed)
4. Submit request
A qualified expert will examine the work and provide professional feedback.

access.question: Who can access my expertise?
access.answer:
Access is strictly controlled:
• Only authorized reviewers can see anonymized expertise
• Personal data automatically removed
• Reviewers bound by NDAs and professional ethical codes
• You maintain full control over which analyses to share
• Complete history of reviews available

enfsi.question: How does ENFSI standards validation work?
enfsi.answer:
ENFSI validation ensures scientific quality:
• Internationally recognized standardized methodologies
• ENFSI certified reviewers with proven experience
• Objective evaluation criteria
• Complete process documentation
• Legal recognition in European forensic context

purpose.question: What is the quiz system for?
purpose.answer:
The Wake Up Quiz is an intelligent educational system that:
• Keeps skills updated in graphology and forensics
• Tests knowledge on real cases and theory
• Generates personalized questions based on your interests
• Tracks progress over time
• Prepares for professional certifications

generation.question: How are questions generated?
generation.answer:
Questions are created by advanced AI:
• Database of real cases and scientific literature
• Adaptation to user level
• Anti-repetition system for guaranteed variety
• Continuous updates with new content
• Balance between theory and practice

topics.question: Can I choose quiz topics?
topics.answer:
Yes, you can fully customize:
Categories: Graphology, Forensics, Analysis techniques
Difficulty: Basic, Intermediate, Advanced
Types: Theory, Practical cases, Visual analysis
Focus: Signatures, Writing, Legal expertise
The system adapts questions to your preferences and performance.

results.question: Are results saved?
results.answer:
Yes, the system maintains a complete history:
• Scores by category and over time
• Improvement areas automatically identified
• Progress towards learning goals
• Comparative statistics with other professionals
• Completion certificates for continuing education

dataProtection.question: How is my data protected?
dataProtection.answer:
GrapholexInsight implements enterprise-grade security:
• AES-256 encryption for data at rest
• TLS 1.3 for transmissions
• Multi-factor authentication available
• Automatic backups with retention policy
• GDPR compliance for European users
• Complete audit trail of activities

anonymization.question: Can I anonymize documents?
anonymization.answer:
Yes, the AI anonymization system automatically detects and replaces:
Personal data: Names, addresses, phone numbers
Identifiers: Tax codes, ID card numbers
Sensitive information: Birth dates, places
AI recognizes 13 entity types in PDF, DOCX, TXT formats.

documentAccess.question: Who has access to my documents?
documentAccess.answer:
Only you have access to your documents:
• Complete isolation between users
• Administrators cannot see content
• Peer review uses anonymized data
• Encrypted backups with personal keys
• Definitive deletion on request

authentication.question: How does the authentication system work?
authentication.answer:
Multi-level secure authentication:
• Strong passwords with security criteria
• Timed sessions with automatic logout
• Brute force attack protection
• Email verification for registration
• Secure password reset with temporary tokens
• Anomalous access monitoring

generatePdf.question: How do I generate PDF reports of analyses?
generatePdf.answer:
Automatic and professional report generation:
1. Complete signature analysis
2. System automatically generates PDF report
3. Includes graphs, tables and AI analysis
4. Customizable with professional templates
5. Immediate download or system saving
Each report includes forensic metadata and timestamps.

templates.question: Can I customize report templates?
templates.answer:
Yes, fully customizable template system:
• Predefined templates for different uses
• Visual editor for modifications
• Custom logos and headers
• Modular sections to include/exclude
• Brand-adaptable styles and colors
• Shareable templates between teams

export.question: How do I export analysis results?
export.answer:
Multiple and flexible export options:
PDF: Complete formatted reports
CSV: Parameter data for statistical analysis
JSON: Structured data for integrations
PNG/JPEG: Graphs and visualizations
All formats maintain data integrity and traceability.

legal.question: Are reports compliant with legal standards?
legal.answer:
Full compliance with forensic standards:
• Scientifically validated methodologies
• Complete process traceability
• Cryptographic timestamps for integrity
• Complete metadata for audit trail
• ISO/IEC 17025 standards for laboratories
• Guaranteed procedural admissibility
